name: hail2u.net
description: The source files of Hail2u (https://hail2u.net/) website
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)

scripts.css: node bin/css.js && node bin/style-guide.js && cp -rTu tmp/ dist/css/ && cp -rTu src/css/ dist/css/
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.img: node bin/icon.js && svgo --config=.svgo.yml -i src/img/logo.svg -o src/partial/logo.mustache -p 0 -q && cp -rTu src/img/ dist/img/
scripts.static: cp src/.nojekyll src/CNAME src/robots.txt dist/ && cp -rTu src/documents/ dist/documents/ && cp -rTu src/pub/ dist/pub/
scripts.test: npm run test_css && npm run test_js
scripts.version: npm run css && npm run js && npm run img && npm run static
scripts.postversion: git push origin master --tags && npm run html -- --articles && npm run predeploy
scripts.predeploy: npm run html && npm run feed
scripts.precss: npm run test_css && npm run clear
scripts.prejs: npm run test_js && npm run clear
